text: Workday has 10,000 plus customers.
They're from small businesses
to very large businesses.

These customers have generating
a huge amount of data

and they want to get
insights from their data.

Being able to use machine
learning to have a better service

and more insight for each
services that we give
to clients is very crucial to us.

So we built a full end-to-end
MLOps solution from
data ingestion to training
and to inference all on AWS platform.

We had a very good partnership
with SageMaker team
to onboard ML engineering teams
to use the platform much easier.

So we were able to keep up,
keep up with the demands,

and also being able to announce
new solutions like Workday

Illuminate, which is a new
Gen AI-based solution.

And it's used leveraging
AWS services underneath.

And that helps us to be
always keep with the demands

of a customer, to provide them
with a better service

and to provide them with
more predictive analytics

as well, which is machine
learning can provide. Using AWS
and the services that AWS provides,
lets us focus on business requirements,
which is a big demand from our clients,
and be able to solve

that without getting too
much into the details
of building managed services.
And this kind of help us
to focus on just solving the business

and making a better product,
which our customers need.
